name: The Caterpillar
description:
The Caterpillar is a mini game where you play as a caterpillar eating leaves to become a butterfly, which will turn back into  a caterpillar. Your job is to keep this cycle of rebirths going for as long as possible.

The Caterpillar was made as part of a 1 Game a month project I'm doing in 2018, and it's the January game.

Soundtrack available on Soundcloud:

https://soundcloud.com/user-737325487/the-caterpillar
